name: Rat Infestation
description: So, here's why I called for you. A rat disease is plaguing of my supply channels, and that makes me kinda unhappy, so to say, and I am kinda busy right now. So, to cut the long story short, go eliminate those rats for me.
success_message: You’re a damn Pinkerton! Helped me out big time!

missions.message: Stash 1 Rat Poison in the trash opposite of stairs on the 3rd floor of the dorm

name: Roach Infestation
description: Let me tell you something. I settled in around here nicely after you eliminated rats, but something just doesn't feel right. Well, since we’re now best pals forever and stuff, I have to say that I am in trouble with roaches. I hope that you will deal with this matter too. Also, do not confuse these bugs with the white-haired witch's horse, or we could have a big problem.
success_message: Good shit, gonna continue working together. Here's your reward.

missions.message: Stash 1 PAID AntiRoach Spray in the microwave on the 3rd floor of the dorm
